Package index

All functions

FindTargetVars()
Helper for Finding Target Variants for Screening
FitNull()
Fit Null Ordinary Least Squares Model
Haps2Genotypes()
Collapse a matrix of haplotypes to genotypes
TestCachedMarkers()
Test All Cached Markers Fast method for performing single marker testing across all variants stored in the kalis::CacheHaplotypes
TestCladeMat()
Test a Clade Matrix (local relatedness matrix) for association with phenotypes
TestLoci()
Wrapper to Test a Chromosome with LOCATER and kalis
TestMarker()
Perform Single Marker Testing (SMT) on a particular variant
TestSprigs()
Test Sprigs
distill_pivot_par()
Parallelized Stable Distillation for the OLS Model
msse.test()
MSSE Test A p-value combination test that combines three independent p-values (element wise if three vectors are given) while prioritizing the first x, as proposed in our pre-print www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2024.09.30.615852. See Details
